Requirements Your horde has been raised

Effect Each enemy in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] around your horde takes @Damage[(ternary(gte(@actor.level,18),8,ternary(gte(@actor.level,14),6,ternary(gte(@actor.level,10),4,2))))d6[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage] damage (if your horde is zombies) or @Damage[(ternary(gte(@actor.level,18),8,ternary(gte(@actor.level,14),6,ternary(gte(@actor.level,10),4,2))))d6[slashing]|options:area-damage] damage (if your horde is skeletons) with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic|options:area-effect] save against your spell DC. At 10th level and every 4 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 2d6.
